title: Honor lvl 3 for a while
body: as it says in the title i am lvl3 honor for a while now and I did not recive a capsule yet....... if someone can tell me what is wrong it would be fine!?

replies.body:
I have played 73 games since i hit honor level 3 and i haven't gotten any capsule yet (and only 2 key fragments) so if u get 1 per 100 games played i think you should consider urself really lucky.
I will most likely hit honor level 4 before i get a capsule!

Capsules are random, but as long as you're honor 3 you'll have a chance.  Sometimes the notification might be delayed as well, so you might not see it until you relog.  Don't give up hope, anyway, you'll get them!
